property.name: term
property.value: pdf monochrome enhanced dashed linewidth 0.6 font ",9" size 11cm,5cm

property.name: dataFetchSQL
property.value: SELECT CAST (extra AS DECIMAL(3,0)) AS extranum, MIN(avgval), MAX(avgval) FROM test_vals WHERE test LIKE 'qu-initial-100-%' AND db LIKE 'cmvbt-%' AND op='op_buffer_fix' GROUP BY extra ORDER BY extranum

property.name: linestyle
property.value: filledcurves closed, '' u 1:2 with linespoints ls 1 notitle, '' u 1:3 with linespoints ls 1 notitle

constructor-arg.value:
set pointsize 0.8 set size ratio 0.4
set style data lines set style fill solid 0.1
set style line 1 lt 1 lw 2 pt 1 set style line 2 lt 5 lw 2 pt 5 set style line 3 lt 6 lw 2 pt 6 set style line 4 lt 7 lw 2 pt 7 set style line 5 lt 2 lw 2 pt 2 set style line 6 lt 3 lw 2 pt 3 set style line 7 lt 4 lw 2 pt 4 set style line 8 lt 8 lw 2 pt 8 set style line 9 lt 9 lw 2 pt 9
set xrange [0:100] set yrange [0:*] set key right bottom
